intakeForm.title: Start Your Journey to Parenthood
intakeForm.highlight: fast and easy with Boost Your Fertility

questions.question: How long is the process on average?
questions.answer: The entire process typically takes 2-3 weeks from initial consultation to receiving your Pleiades Device. This includes the consultation, medical review, and expedited delivery to your doorstep.

questions.question: Are there any additional fees?
questions.answer: No hidden fees! Our transparent pricing includes everything: consultation, device, and expedited delivery. What you see is what you pay.

questions.question: How is my provider selected?
questions.answer: We carefully match you with a licensed healthcare provider based on your medical history, preferences, and specific needs. All our providers are board-certified and experienced in male fertility and reproductive health.

questions.question: Does the Pleiades Device actually work?
questions.answer: Yes! The Pleiades Device is a scientifically-backed, non-invasive solution designed to improve sperm quality and overall fertility. Our approach combines advanced technology with compassionate care to support your journey to parenthood. Results vary by individual.

banner.title: About Us
banner.subtitle: Quality is our guarantee!
banner.description: Boost Fertility is a pioneering brand dedicated to providing innovative solutions for male fertility enhancement. Our flagship product, the Pleiades Device, offers a non-invasive, effective, and scientifically-backed approach to improving sperm quality and overall fertility. We combine advanced technology with compassionate care to support our customers on their journey to parenthood.

support.title: Unlimited 24/7 Support Included
support.description: Boost Your Fertility provides 24/7 access to a dedicated team of specialists, ensuring you have the support you need around the clock. With unlimited appointments, messaging and support, you can confidently reach out for guidance, ask questions, or address concerns at any time.

providers.title: Hand Selected Providers
providers.description: Boost Your Fertility physicians are here to guide you every step of the way, bringing both their expertise and genuine care to keep you supported.
